markdown:
> In the world of open source, community contributions are the norm. That’s why Mozilla’s recent decision to overwrite community contributions with an AI-powered bot feels like such a betrayal.

Youssuff writes about [Mozilla's betrayal](https://www.quippd.com/writing/2025/12/08/mozillas-betrayal-of-open-source-googles-gemini-ai-is-overwriting-volunteer-work-on-support-mozilla.html).
